name: TetrisTank
description:
↑ Make sure to zoom to full screen (bottom right buton)

Tetris1 + Besiege + Tower defense. Build your very custom blocky chariot to defend, but try to keep balance! Sometimes the more you have, the worse it is!

A Ludum Dare 40 Compo game. Made by shrekshao in 48 hrs

Actual player screen shot
